reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Strengthening key malaria control interventions for malaria elimination in Chad

description.narrative: Chad - Malaria - Ministry of Public Health and National Solidarity - MOH. This program has the following goals: Contribuer à l’amélioration de l’état de santé de la population du Tchad/Contribute to improving the health status of the population of Chad.. The objectives of this program are: D’ici fin 2023, au moins 80 % de la population à risque du paludisme sera protégée par des interventions efficaces de prévention /By the end of 2023, at least 80% of the population at risk of malaria will be protected by effective prevention interventions. D’ici fin 2023, 100% des cas de paludisme diagnostiqués seront traités conformément aux directives nationales dans les formations sanitaires et au niveau communautaire /By the end of 2023, 100% of diagnosed malaria cases will be treated in accordance with national guidelines in health facilities and at community level. D’ici fin 2023, au moins 80% des épidémies du paludisme dans les districts à risque seront détectées et circonscrites /By the end of 2023, at least 80% of malaria epidemics in at-risk districts will be detected and contained. D’ici fin 2023, au moins 95% des structures concernées transmettront à temps les données complètes et de qualité sur les principaux indicateurs de la lutte contre le paludisme /By the end of 2023, at least 95% of facilities will provide timely, comprehensive and quality data on key malaria control indicators. D’ici fin 2023, 80% de la population adopte des comportements favorables à la lutte contre le paludisme /By the end of 2023, 80% of the population will adopt positive behaviors to fight malaria. D’ici fin 2023, les capacités institutionnelles du programme seront renforcées afin d’assurer une gestion efficace de la lutte contre le paludisme à tous les niveaux/By the end of 2023, the institutional capacities of the national program will be strengthened to ensure effective management of the fight against malaria at all levels.

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test at public sector health facilities
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment at private sector sites
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment in the community
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test at private sector sites
Proportion of suspected malaria cases that receive a parasitological test in the community
Proportion of pregnant women attending antenatal clinics who received three or more doses of intermittent preventive treatment for malaria
Proportion of confirmed malaria cases that received first-line antimalarial treatment at public sector health facilities
